fields.text: Greedy Goblins
Goblins randomly wander the levels; hoarding gems, gold, runes and other special items
They care nothing for battle, their souls entwined by the treasures they seek
Old man Cain heard a rumor they never appear in the same place twice...
Gemma Perfectus
Mordeaux the Dead Mind
Once a fallen monster, now just a soul-less shell of insatiable curiousity
Gems. Perfect Gems. This creature's mind has been deadened to any other thought.
Opulentus Sicarius
Xan of the Umbra Lunae
Once a fallen monster, now it's mind twisted to wealth and shadow.
Legends tell of a wealth of info and gold being spewed from this monster.
Divitiae Absconditus
Elr the Ignis
A once noble Fire Sorceress, now corrupted by power in service to darkness
It holds potentially powerful artifacts for those who may be lucky.
Runarum Avarus
Hells Runekeeper
A demon granted power by the collective whispers of the masses, chanting it's name. Jah-men.
Various symbols of power are imbued on this demon, maybe that power can be harnessed.
Famulus Bonesii
Bonesy's Familiar
A fragment of Edyrem's soul, the last of the Nephalem - taken form.
Light emanates from this monster at all times, unable to control its prismatic power.
Tormented Monsters
Diablo's minions and victims alike have fallen into torment...
All color drained from their lifeless souls, forever trapped...
They fear nothing, feel nothing; as the ice slowly consumes them.
Ender'aku
Putrid Herald of Darkness
An evil being that has been twisted and mis-shapen by the corpses she's consumed.
She desires nothing but to feed on flesh, and feed her spawning brood.
Izual the Forsaken
Corrupted Fire Lord
Once a force against evil; now corrupted by the Prime Evil's resurrected powers.
Even they dare not enter his territory now...truly forsaken by all beings now.
Gurka
Soul-Torn Puppet Master
Imbued with ancient, dark magic...this headless demon controls the souls of the fallen.
His blood has turned purple after consuming the blood of so many humans.
Queen Syndred
Lady of Corruption
The power of the great resurrection has tainted this demon of terror.
Only bits of flesh remain; the rest consumed by the fire of hatred.
Ded'Domer
Breaker of Realms
The master of the Arcane Dimensional magic - Bending the realms to do his bidding.
His overflow of magic causes flames to spontaneously engulf him.
Anuburak
Nightmare of Horadrim
Enraged during the maelstrom of chaos; it has absorbed untold power.
Losing all intellect and reason...it now only knows the hunt.
Raku'Ranth
Demon Swordmaster
True sword experts that have trained in the arts of execution.
Their skin turned to an undead white after the great resurrection.
Kelthir
Beastmaster of Arms
Deadly with any weapon; his beast-like ferocity and speed have only increased.
Their skin turning black after human blood has soaked into their very being.
Grizzlepaw
Tainted Bear King
Once loyal to the druids; now malformed into a tool of evil.
Battle hardened and created without fur - all know the king.
Majiko
Mutated Leaper
Bestowed great size and speed has enabled it to be a deadly minion
It's tormented soul making it become more erratic and lethal.
